summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Beacon Avenue, from Spokane Street to 39th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5827, appropriating additional money therefor, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 76799.
committee: Finance, City Utilities and Streets and Sewers
